title: The most prominent 100 interpretations of a dream about a turkey according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a turkey in a dream: Turkey is one of the birds that has a delicious taste and is considered one of the most expensive birds sold as food. It is certain that a person’s vision of it in his dream carries many connotations depending on the form in which he saw it or the social status of the bird. The scenes and other details that may differ from one vision to another, and let us get to know all the interpretations conveyed by seeing a turkey in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a turkey in a dream Seeing a turkey in a dream is one of the visions that predicts for its owner abundant sustenance and a lot of money if he suffers from poverty. But if he is prosperous, then his vision is evidence of a blessing coming to him in his wealth and children. Imam Al-Sadiq said: The person who has the vision may be a morally committed person who always strives to do good, and his vision is evidence of that, and he must give him more than the gifts that will bring him closer. May God Almighty be a reason for raising his status in the afterlife. If the dreamer buys one of the turkeys in his dream, this is a sign of his good luck and the fulfillment of his desires and ambitions, which has always been a dream he would like to achieve. It is evidence of recovery from diseases and freedom from worries and pains. If one sees it flying high, even though it is not one of the birds that actually flies, then this is an indication of the fortuneteller’s high status and that his life will change for the better. A turkey in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: If The dreamer holds a prestigious position, his vision is evidence that he is a just man who does not oppress anyone, and that he is loved by all the employees who work under his management. As for the poor, he will soon make happy dating, his living conditions will improve and he will earn a lot of money through halal trade. If one sees In a dream, he is being slaughtered and blood is oozing from him, this is evidence that he has been liberated from the sorrows that afflicted him in a previous period of his life and that he will enjoy peace and stability far away. . Of sorrows and adversities. Seeing a woman who has a husband and children shows her marital happiness and the luxury granted to her by her husband who does not skimp on her or his children with his money. Interpretation of seeing a turkey in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about one turkey has many positive meanings for a girl. It is said that seeing a red rooster is a sign that she has overcome a long period of pain and suffering due to her delayed marriage and that the reward for her patience will be a connection with a prominent figure in society that she finds. Her happiness is in her marriage to him. But if she sees herself giving it to someone else, she wishes happiness for this person from the bottom of her heart, and her engagement will be broken if she is engaged, but the alternative will be better than the one that came before. Seeing him in her dream indicates that she is ambitious and wants to find She gets a job that suits her qualifications and that she can achieve a high position in her work thanks to her diligence and dedication to work. The virtuous woman, if she is a young girl who has not yet reached the age of marriage, will excel and reach an advanced position in her studies, which will make her a source of pride for her parents. If she plays with him and feels happy , he will receive the very happy news that he was

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about magic for a single woman, the interpretation of a dream about magic by relatives for a single woman, and the interpretation of a dream about breaking magic for a single woman.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream for a single woman: Seeing magic is one of the visions that disturbs the conscience. Magic is as old as all of humanity, and all heavenly religions agree in depriving and condemning it to those who practice it, because it is considered a symbol of evil and corruption. On earth, and when you see magic in a dream, this indicates many indicators that differ according to different cases. Magic can come from envy and is performed by a person close to the circle of knowledge, and what concerns us in this article is to review all the details and meanings of the dream of magic for single people. Interpretations Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of a dream about magic for an unmarried womanInterpretation of a dream about magic for a single woman The vision of magic expresses the vanity of the world, its joys, and its temptations that attract attention, delight the heart, and attract a person to its machinations from which it is difficult to escape. As for the interpretation of magic in a dream for an unmarried woman, this vision indicates lies, deception, and distraction. And confusion and inability to see things as they are, which negatively affects the girl’s decisions and her evaluation of things around her. If she sees that she is under the influence of magic, this indicates the presence of someone who is exploiting her to serve his interests and goals, or the existence of a relationship linking her to someone, and that person is misleading her in his love for her. . And his desire to get closer to her, but he does so to achieve his nefarious goals. This vision also indicates the constant turmoil that you find when starting to implement a project or failing to achieve the goal and the constant postponement of all his plans and goals. Ibn Shaheen goes so far as to say that seeing magic expresses ugliness and humiliation. And falsehood, hypocrisy, hypocrisy in speech and action, the wrong path, and insistence on listening to the dictates of a malevolent spirit. If she sees a witch in her dream, this indicates the enemy who carries with her hostility and hatred, and this enemy is trying in every possible way to harm her, sabotage her plans and efforts, violate her private life and exploit her. scoundrel. Objectives. On the other hand, this vision is considered an indication of non-performance of acts of worship and misguidance, straying from the correct and straight path, and the necessity of making the girl aware of the nature of the world, and getting rid of obsessions. And thoughts that change her mind and disrupt her life. From the point of view of psychologists, although most of them hardly recognize magic, the vision expresses love for the lover or suitor, as he falls at his mercy and in the captivity of his love, and loses the ability to control himself, and follows him in plenty. And thin, and the dissolution of an individual’s being into his own being. In short, seeing magic is one of the unpleasant visions in a dream, and it is an indication of the instability of life’s circumstances, the passage of many faults and sad days and the inability to escape from this difficult period. Interpretation of a dream about magic for an unmarried woman by Ibn Siriniri Ibn Sirin said that seeing magic means deception, disorder, lying, and many sins, immersion in the world and its desires, violation of instinct and the laws of nature that govern the universe, rejection of God’s way of keeping up with the world, rebellion against will and power, and the desire to change what is written. And if an unmarried girl sees magic in her dream, this loll

title: Interpretation of a dream about an ant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an ant in the house and interpretation of a dream about killing an ant

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about ants varies from one person to another. There are those for whom the ant represents a lack of self-confidence or one’s abilities, and there are those who represent it as hostility from a person who is not like them in any way, and there are those. Who do they represent with other things that we will learn about after attending our topic today, according to the statements of major interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin and others? Interpretation of a dream about ants. What is the interpretation of a dream about ants by Ibn Sirin? Imam Ibn Sirin said that seeing an ant in a dream can be interpreted in several ways, including: Seeing a woman is not Having children is a sign of the fulfillment of her desire and a response to her prayer for God to grant her a beautiful child who will fill her life and make her and her husband’s hearts happy. But if an unmarried young man sees her and wants to marry one of the girls, he must be protected from the evil of those who hate him and envy him, trying to sabotage the relationship between him and this girl’s family. He does not belong, and it is easy to identify that person and completely avoid dealing with him to avoid giving him a chance to harm him. The dream carries many worries and sorrows for its owner, if he finds that this ant is emerging from a place deep in the ground and expresses a major problem that he suffers from and that is difficult for him to overcome at a time short. But he needs help from others to be able to eradicate it. But if he sees her leaving the place she is in and moving away from him, wanting her home or her burrow, then this is good news that the worries will go away and the distress will go away. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. What What is the interpretation of a dream about ants for a single woman? Does the girl see the ant with its companions in a specific order or does she see it alone searching for food or walking on its body and stinging it? These details and more are known below: The girl may be suffering from some randomness in her life and needs someone to guide her and guide her towards the benefit and importance of the system. She has to follow a certain system in her life, so that she can achieve her ambitions and goals, as long as she makes a good plan for that. But if he sees her walking in her clothes and continues to follow her without trying to kill her, then there is a sign that a new girl or friend will enter her life and will be very close to her in the next stage. Of her life. She must be careful in dealing with her until she is sure of her sincerity and love for him. As for the girl who was bitten by the ant, this is evidence that she was deceived and betrayed by those close to her, who had previously trusted her with her secrets, but unfortunately she did not deserve the girl’s trust. If she sees The girl is carrying some food on her back from her own kitchen, which means that there is a financial crisis that the girl is facing these days, but she is overcoming it after finding a suitable job that provides her with a reasonable income to help her. . To get out of her crisis. But if he sees her walking on her body, there is pain that will control her these days and she must care about her health more than before. Interpretation of a dream about an ant for a married woman: If the woman sees that this ant and another group have dug into the floor of her house and taken a home from her, then there is a situation that is getting worse. There are disagreements and problems between her and her husband, and their duration can be prolonged if she does so. Can't find a solution

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person being alive, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams alive and dead There is no doubt that seeing death or dying is one of the visions that raise panic and fear in the heart, and even if death is a certain and indisputable topic, many of us fear the approaching period and the end of life, and this has an impact on the interpretation of death and seeing the dead, and what concerns us In this article is to review in more detail and explain the meaning of seeing a dead person alive, the meaning of the dream and what it brings to its owner. Interpretation of a dream about the dead: Seeing the deceased relates to his condition. If he is happy, this indicates his happiness with what God has given him. The vision can be a message of reassurance to his relatives about his place with his Lord, but if he dies. Sad, this is a sign of unhappiness, illness, a succession of worries, and a request for prayers and alms for his soul. Whoever sees the dead alive, this indicates the resurrection of faded hopes, getting out of adversity and crises, overcoming obstacles that discourage one’s steps, stopping efforts, achieving the goal, and fulfilling the need. The soul. Whoever is in hardship and the dead person is alive, this indicates happiness and comfort, almost comfort, and sustenance may come to him from where he does not support, renewal of ties and partnerships, victory and great wealth, and the acquisition of benefits and plunder. Whoever sees a familiar dead person rising after his death, this indicates life and health after illness and hardships, and the death of life’s troubles and troubles of the soul, and the person may be blessed with great advantages and gifts or obtain something of his own. He kept looking for him for a long time, or returned to him absent after a long separation. Interpretation of a dream about dead people by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing a dead person has to do with his condition, his appearance, and the actions and words that come out of him. Whoever sees the dead person talking to him, this is evidence of his sincerity; Because they are in the abode of truth, and in these homes it is impossible to lie or lie. Also, seeing a dead person alive shows renewed hopes in the heart, despair disappears from it, water returns to its natural course, one escapes from adversity, and achieves opportunities and demands. And whoever sees a dead person knows him alive, this indicates To repent and be guided before it is too late, to stay away from negligence and its bad consequences, to remove despair from the heart, to be saved from adversity and trouble, to stop waiting and trouble. If the dead person is unknown and he sees that he is alive, this is an indication of reviving a dead or desperate subject, receiving good news and good things, and transcending Obstacles and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life, and achieving goals and objectives. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person alive for single people. Seeing death or a dead person symbolizes the loss of hope in something, the many fears that surround and violate it, and turning to paths that do not benefit from it. And whoever saw a dead person you knew and he was alive Life, this indicates recovery from a serious illness, or coming out of a bitter experience, or achieving a goal that you intend to achieve, or achieving planned goals, and if the deceased is alive after his death, then this is the case. A sign of long harvest wishes. And if she sees her dead father alive, this indicates her need for protection and care, and she may lack attachment and pride in her life, which prompts her to make wrong decisions that do not fulfill her needs.

title: I dreamed that I was buying raw meat

preview.html: I dreamed that I was buying raw meat in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Meat is a necessary food product and is accepted by many for its nutritional value because it contains many minerals and vitamins that are important for human health. The body, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was buying raw meat. For the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was buying raw meat in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision Purchasing meat intentionally in a dream indicates that the dreamer has suffered a great loss in his life or lost someone he loves, and God knows best. Seeing meat intentionally in general in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will be exposed to something bad in the coming period. Eating raw meat in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and crises. A major dispute between the dreamer and one of his family members may lead to discord, and God knows best. The intention of distributing meat in a dream indicates that the viewer will go through a difficult economic crisis in the coming period. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing the intention of meat in a dream. I dreamed that I was buying raw meat in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a woman in a dream An unmarried woman buys meat on purpose and says that she will soon marry a young man who suits her and whom she loves. He ate meat with the intention of being in his sleep. It shows that she is a reckless girl who makes all her decisions hastily without thinking about the outcome and this causes her a lot of problems. I dreamed that I was buying raw meat in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a woman A married woman buys meat intentionally in a dream. Refer to her husband’s approach, and God knows best. Intentionally cutting meat with a knife in a married woman’s dream shows a lot of bad words and lies about someone in her life. Distributing meat intentionally in a married woman’s dream shows that she is always spreading wrong and false words to those around her. Seeing a woman A married woman with a structure in her house in a dream. She says that the coming period will be full of worries and anxiety in her life. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing fat in a dream. I dreamed that I was buying raw meat in a dream for a man. Seeing a man intentionally buying meat in a dream shows that he will face many bad things and problems in his life. A man deliberately ate meat in a dream. It shows that he will face serious health problems in the near future. Seeing meat in a dream from Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing eating raw bird meat in a dream shows that there is bad talk about the reputation of the fortuneteller. Eating raw meat in a dream indicates that the dreamer has been exposed to a great misfortune in his life. I see in a dream that I am eating raw fish. It indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, sustenance, and blessings in his life. Seeing meat in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman eating meat intentionally in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. The intention of minced meat in a pregnant woman’s dream shows that she You think a lot about the birth process and feel anxious and stressed. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing eating meat in a dream. We are happy to see the reception of your dream.

Eating raw meat in a dream indicates that the dreamer has been exposed to a great calamity in his life. I see in a dream that I am eating raw fish. It indicates God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, sustenance and blessings in his life. Seeing meat in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman eating meat on purpose in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. The intention of minced meat in a pregnant woman’s dream shows that she thinks a lot about the birth process and feels anxious and tense. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing eating meat in a dream We are happy to see the reception of your dream

title: I dreamed that I got married and I am married to a man I know and I am pregnant

preview.html: I dreamed that I got married and I am married to a man I know and I am pregnant. She was married and pregnant. It is considered one of the dreams that has many different interpretations, whether according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin or the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi and others. Many interpretations have been proposed regarding the marriage of a married woman, and we will then discuss the interpretation of the dream of a married man. A woman who married a man she knew while she was pregnant. I dreamed that I was married and I was married. There are many interpretations mentioned in the dream that there is a married woman who dreams that she is married. Some scholars also mentioned different interpretations of this dream, and among the most prominent of these interpretations that came to interpret the dream are: the following: If a married woman sees that she has remarried to a man other than her husband, it is interpreted that she will be joined by that person who dreams of becoming her husband at work and will begin a life of prosperity and kindness for them. If a married woman sees that she has remarried to her husband, it interprets that There is great affection and love that brings them together. If she dreams that she got married while she is married to a dead man, this indicates that she will soon be exposed to some health problems. If she dreams that she is married and that her husband married her to another man, this is an interpretation that she will be exposed to a financial crisis and great losses. Interpretation of dreams: I am married He is married to Ibn Sirin. Many different interpretations were mentioned by the scholar Ibn Shirin, and he also confirmed that a married woman who dreams of getting married while she is married will have good luck, and he mentioned many interpretations as follows: If a married wife dreams that she is married to someone other than her husband, this indicates goodness. And the contentment and grace that she enjoys in her life. If a married woman dreams that she will marry again, this is an interpretation of the marriage of one of her children. Interpretation of a dream that a married woman marries her husband again, indicating that she will soon give birth to a long-awaited child. If a married woman sees in her dream That she married a man she does not know, this is evidence that her life and circumstances will improve for the better and she will find a new job and promotion in her academic life. Interpretation of dreams that I got married and I am married to a man I know and I am pregnant. The interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman getting married in a dream is considered good and with meanings. These dreams herald goodness and happiness that will flood the life of the opinion. Many women want to find an explanation for the dream that she got married while she was married to a man she knows during pregnancy, and the most prominent interpretations that came are as follows: A married woman’s dream is that she is married to a man she knows, which is a good thing for the wife’s family. However, if she sees that she has married a man she does not know, this indicates undesirable suggestions, as she may leave one of her family members. Or she is suffering from an illness. If a married pregnant woman sees that she is getting married, this indicates many beautiful people and the joy that will enter her life as it is. If she sees that she is giving birth, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy and all the misery of childbirth will be removed. The scholar Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi confirmed that if she dreams A married woman is that she is married to a man, she knows better than others, she does not know that. Interpretation of dreams: I am married and married to a son

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a lover is considered one of the visions that kindle passion and rejoice the soul, and this vision is common in the dreams of girls, especially single women, and this vision has many connotations that vary for various reasons, including that he may see them. The family of the beloved, and she can kiss him or hug him, and she can hold his hand or watch him betray her or die and leave her. What concerns us in this article is to mention all the details and special cases of seeing the lover in a dream for a single woman. Learn about the interpretation of seeing the lover in a dream for an unmarried woman with a son. Sirin: Seeing a lover in a single woman’s dream: Seeing a lover expresses acceptance, reverence, and love that fills the heart and the beginning to take things seriously and appreciate every step taken by the person with the vision. This vision also indicates personal duties and responsibilities, monitoring every movement and behavior that stems from them, and making many adjustments to one’s style. Her personality and the improvement of her relationships with others. This vision is an indication of many desires and desires that she works hard to achieve, regardless of the difficulties she faces, and works diligently to achieve her goal. If the lover sees it repeatedly, this indicates his preoccupation with her, excessive thinking, and an irresistible desire to talk. With him at any time and waiting for some events that will happen in the near future. If the girl sees and rejoices, this symbolizes that she will receive good news or improve her relationship with him and the end of the quarrel that has accumulated between them and the beginning of a new quarrel. But if the unmarried woman sees her lover and does not declare his love to him in reality, then this It indicates the things that she cannot obtain, the desires that she hides within herself, and the psychological conflicts that take place within her. Seeing a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a lover expresses the inevitable responsibilities, duties, duties, and desires that cannot be achieved by sitting and not getting up. With anything. This vision also indicates the tremendous development, extraordinary changes and changes that occur in the girl’s life, and the trials and obstacles that she overcomes with more work and patience. Seeing love is a sign of sadness, pain, many battles in life, fears of the future, and constant anxiety that things will go out of their way. The scope of control and caution from any step forward. On the other hand, if a girl sees her lover, this indicates negligence in some of the tasks assigned to her, excessive thinking and laziness in implementing those assigned to her, and the loss of many opportunities. This vision is also a sign of blindness in seeing The truth, ignoring the negativity of others, not listening to everything they say, and following the whims and what the heart asks of her. But if she sees her lover and her passion overwhelming her, this is a sign of neglecting duties and worship and putting her entire life at the disposal of others and attachment to others other than God. In short, this vision indicates She has many problems and issues that can only be solved by strengthening the love of God in her heart above all else, and doing what is required of her without delay or delay.

title: Interpretation of ice cream in a dream The meaning of ice cream in a dream

preview.html: Ice cream or donderma or mota Ice cream in the dream of a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a single girl is a sign of buying, eating and preparing ice cream with milk, cocoa, strawberries, etc. Ibn Sirin Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabul Interpretation of the dream of eating ice cream by Miller If you dream that you are eating ice cream, this foretells that you You will achieve pleasant success in the work affairs you completed previously. If you see children eating it, it means that prosperity and happiness will take care of you in the best possible way. If a girl spoils ice cream in the presence of her lover or friend, this means that she will be pushed aside because of her rudeness to others. If you see sour ice cream, it means that unexpected problems will interfere with your pleasures. If it melts, your expected happiness will remain stagnant before it becomes reality, like ice cream or ice cream in a dream like other types of sweets and soft drinks. Ice cream is made of milk, water and sugar. It is one of the positive symbols in dream interpretation. It is a sign of safety in matters related to money and health. Ice cream or gelato is very praiseworthy in a dream if it is made from frozen fruit puree or fresh and in a dream it can express renewed energy or flowing and pure emotions. Interpretation of ice cream or ice cream in one's dreamAll Ice Cream It is worthy of praise in a woman's dream, because ice cream in the interpretation is good, and a sign of kindness and momentary happiness. If a girl sees in her dream that she is buying ice cream, this means the good news that will happen to her or the happy news that she will hear in this interpretation, often expresses Sugar and sweets in dreams are about pleasure, bliss, or happy events, just as in the interpretation, such as soft drinks, soft drinks, and other types of sweets. If a woman or girl sees in her dream that she is eating ice cream, and then finds it delicious or sweet, then the dream indicates A desire in her heart that could soon be fulfilled. Change its time or season, for example. That summer fruits are disliked in winter and winter fruits are disliked in summer. Sometimes ice cream in a dream does not have any symbolic meaning, but is simply an expression of the dreamer’s desire to eat or consume it, and therefore does not have any specific interpretation or meaning. Ice cream or gelani often expresses Or ice cream expresses the fortuneteller’s desire to improve his general mood or relieve his stress, because ice cream is mainly associated with the idea of ​​recovery. Ice cream or ice cream in a married woman’s dream. Buying ice cream in a married woman’s dream indicates quick profit and expenses, due to the rapid melting of this product. As for keeping it in the refrigerator, it is an expression of saving livelihood or money. It is a good interpretation to see a married woman in her dream as eating ice cream of all kinds and flavors, and such ice cream is flavored with strawberries, chocolate, or vanilla. Also, crushing ice cream in the interpretation may express About pleasure or benign surprise in the interpretation is good, and if

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman caressing a woman

preview.html: If the woman she dreams of is divorced, this indicates her desire and will to marry. Interpretation of seeing a woman caressing a woman in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees that the woman in front of her knows, and is flirting with another woman in the dream, it indicates that he wants to get married in the near future, and that he is currently working. Seriously on this issue. The unmarried girl who prevented a woman from following another woman in a dream, and separated them. It explains that she is preventing what was happening to her, and that this matter is good, and God knows best. And seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she is caressing another woman in the dream with her desire. It shows that she is looking for something in her life, but this is harmful to her and she must be careful. Seeing an unmarried girl looking at a woman asking her to caress her in a dream and she refuses. It indicates that someone will propose to her now, and she will reject him, and God knows best. Watch. Also: Interpretation and meaning of seeing an unknown and strange woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman caressing a woman in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is caressing another woman in a dream and desires. It shows that she is seeking to solve the problems and issues in her life and that she is trying to get rid of them. And seeing a married woman that someone asked her to Her acquaintances are caressing her. This is a sign that she will get rid of some of the things that make her sad in life, God willing. A married woman sees in a dream that another woman is caressing her intensely in the dream. It indicates something that will surprise you in the near future, and will make her very happy, God willing. And seeing that The married woman fulfilled the request of the other woman, and touched her in the dream. This indicates that she will get rid of some of the crises that her family is suffering from. Interpretation of seeing a woman caressing a woman in a dream for a divorced woman: If he sees a divorced woman in a dream, then he caresses a woman very close to him in the dream. This indicates that she She will get married soon in her life, and God knows best. It is as if the divorced woman is looking at the other woman and wants to caress her in the dream. This indicates that she is chasing someone and that this issue is on her mind at the moment. The divorced woman said that she was flirting with her boyfriend in the dream and they were very happy in the dream. Together. This is an indication that a lot of good will happen to her, and that good will happen in her life, God willing. If a divorced woman caresses another dead woman in a dream and she is happy with her. It shows that she will accept a new job or an important matter in her life, God willing. Read also: Interpretation Seeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a woman caressing a woman in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees that a woman is caressing another woman in front of him, and he sees her from afar. This indicates that he will marry soon, God willing, to a righteous woman. The same applies to the dreamer who forces a woman to caress another woman in front of him. And he is looking at her. This is an indication that he will enter into a major crisis in the near future, but he will succeed in ending it. The dreamer who looks at a woman caressing another and was talking to them in a dream. This indicates that he will put an end to major problems and crises that were present in his work in the recent period.

This indicates that he will marry soon, God willing, to a righteous woman. The same applies to the dreamer who forces a woman to caress another woman in front of him. And he is looking at her. This is an indication that he will enter into a major crisis in the near future, but he will succeed in ending it. The dreamer who looks at a woman caressing another and was talking to them in a dream. This indicates that he will put an end to major problems and crises that were present in his work in the recent period.
